meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by first-year coursework and uncertain about my major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Mark, a first-year student in Romance Languages. I’ve taken a mix of English and Spanish classes, and while I’ve enjoyed some of the content, I’m feeling like I’m doing a lot of work and not getting anywhere. My grades are still in the high range, but I’m starting to feel like I’m not measuring up to what I’m doing, and I’m starting to wonder if I should major in something like French or Italian instead. I’m also feeling burned out from school, with long days and a lot of work ahead. I’m not sure if I’m doing okay, and I’m worried I’m falling behind or missing something important.
